text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Um...
"'You said 'take it as you like,' but..."

"How should I interpret that question mark?
Could you tell me?"

Hmm...
It's not quite clear...

Good work, Kogane.
Practicing your lines for the play?

I feel like I've heard that line somewhere before...
Is it just me?

It's not just you~!
It's from the script of that drama audition I failed.
I see...

But, why were you going
over that script again?

Well~
you know... The drama airs today.

The lines from earlier,
I couldn't quite grasp them during the audition.
Even after reviewing them, they were still challenging...

But I thought I'd give it another
shot before the drama airs!

I see... The drama airs tonight, doesn't it?
...Mind if I watch it with you?
Of course not!

Hehe... If Producer is watching with me,
I'll make sure to have some drinks ready!
Just sit tight and wait!

Ah,
thanks, Kogane.
(Indeed, this script is quite challenging...)

(What hidden meaning could be behind
the lines Kogane was practicing...?)
Hmm... I wonder if Kogane's interpretation was correct...?
"You said "take it as you like", but..."

"How should I interpret that question mark?
Could you tell me?"
...What do you think, Producer?
I think it's fine, isn't it...?

Really...?
I'm still not quite sure...

It was the last line of the drama,
so I couldn't understand the context before or after it.

It might be for
sparking discussion on social media...

But, Producer,
you seem to understand it better than me...

...It's just my interpretation,
so I'm not sure if it's correct.
This girl...

You said "take it as you like", throwing that
ball over here... It's a bit sneaky...
Maybe she wanted to throw it back...?

That's the spirit~!
I didn't quite get it either~!

It's like, because you like someone,
you want to give a little back, right?
...I've learned something.

Hehe... Speaking of which,
auditions for this director's next project are starting soon.
Are you gonna give it a shot, Kogane?

Yeah~! I'm gonna try!
Please support me~!!
